Contact

If you have any questions about these courses, or are interested in a one-on-one training session, or in-house session for your team, please complete for form below, including as much information as possible, and we will endeavour to respond within 1-2 business days.

Course venue:

All courses are held at:

The IVC (International Visualisation Centre)
19 Young Street
Adelaide
South Australia 5000

Please note: The specific room that courses are held in may change from session to session. Please check the directory screen in the entrance to The IVC, or ask at reception.
